markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anarchic Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=7209) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 54

**Prerequisites**
[Proteankin](/Feats.aspx?ID=7198)

</column>

---

The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll 1d12 twice and consult the following list. 1: [_acid grip_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1436); 2: [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1455); 3: [_gecko grip_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1541); 4: [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1560); 5: [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1569); 6: [_laughing fit_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1583); 7: [_noise blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1616); 8: [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1651); 9: [_see the unseen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663); 10: [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1670); 11: [_shrink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1672); 12: [_telekinetic maneuver_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1717). You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled the same number) as 2nd-rank divine innate spells.
name: Anarchic Arcana

summary_markdown: The magic in your blood is unpredictable.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Anarchic Arcana Source War of Immortals pg. 54 Prerequisites Proteankin --- The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll 1d12 twice and consult the following list. 1: acid grip ; 2: blur ; 3: gecko grip ; 4: humanoid form ; 5: illusory object ; 6: laughing fit ; 7: noise blast ; 8: resist energy ; 9: see the unseen ; 10: shatter ; 11: shrink ; 12: telekinetic maneuver . You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled the same number) as 2nd-rank divine innate spells.
